Two clubhouses are planned by the developer, so waiting to see how it will work out once completed. Only thing it is little far from my office but that's an okay compromise if I look at family's need.

I think pricing-wise, it is costly a little. But Godrej is the developer so that gives a sort of confidence since they are a big company who always finish project on time. Location is A-Grade and so is the features they are offering. Taken the plunge with my investment and sector 39 is already developed. I wanted to stay somewhere already established and not some upcoming part of Gurgaon. Let's see how it comes up finally.

I invested here seeing the location. In my opinion, SPR is going to become the main hub of Gurgaon and the busiest road over the next 3-4 years and that's why wanted to stay here before prices go up drastically which they will. Also, the amenities mentioned are a big plus point in my opinion.

As an agent, I will give full marks to this project. It is one of the best that is coming up along SPR. All other big players like DLF and all are also looking at this road as the next big destination in the city. When you consider its pricing at this location and the amenities and size they are providing, I think it is a good deal for any buyer.

Signature is a brand name and that's why it could be a good option for families looking for a spacious township living. I got attracted to the whole promise of a big township that is coming up along the Southern Peripheral Road. All hospitals, schools, malls are also situated nearby as I found out myself. Cutting one point since location is a little far from my and wife's office area, but still am happy with the allotment experience. Hope that the flat completed is like they have promised.

Full thumbs up to team Signature. The way they have interacted with us and got the bookings done is very nice and smooth. Also, I am betting on the fact that our towers will be part of the whole township. So naturally my family will not have to go anywhere else outside for anything. A school is coming up so good from family planning part. Location-wise, I have visited the site and the drive is smooth and fast from Golf Course Extension.

One thing is for sure that Signature has been a big name in GUrgaon market. So they will not default on the project which I am sure about. As a buyer I have checked the area with my family members. Seems to be centrally located if you take SPR route alignment into account. also in-laws live in Sector 89 which is not that far. That is also a point to consider when I am finally buying something for next two to three generations.

I am excited to be a part of DLF Phase-6 development. As I heard, lots of offices coming up, American Express, also biggest Mall of North India, new Cyber City. So that was my biggest incentive for choosing Sector 76 and this project. I only hope that they have planned the route alignemnt in such a way that traffic congestion is less. Looking forward to completion

On paper, I am happy with what I am investing in. So, Dwarka Expressway is only 5-6 mins away as I drove myself and saw. SPR is also nearby and so is the NH-8. So, you get all these connectivity options. Also kicked about so many corporate offices and the mall coming up here. Looks to be a Dubai-like lifestyle and I feel the huge layouts they are giving is worth the price.

Wanted something that was really big since I have a joint family! Now layout and sizes are good as they are promising. Also tallest DLF tower ever is one appeal that will make it a signature address for me and my family. Also, I feel that prices will rise even more in the future, since so many major roads are nearby. DLF Phase-6 will bring a very costly lifestyle here and that is why it is better to buy now. That's the reason I did it. I think it will be a upgrade from my current stay in Gurgaon.

Approach road is good to the project. Also my office is not very far away. So these were two things that mattered. Then I am passionate about golf. So four planned golf courses (hope they will be ready by the time I move in) are a big attraction. Planned jungle safari in the area is also going to be good for children and bring more tourist footfall. Only thing son's school is far away, but school bus connectivity is there and hopefully in next 2-3 years it will be even better.

Only thing when I am investing so much is that it has to be the best developer. DLF is one name that gives me lot of confidence. So, went with DLF despite looking at other projects coming up in the area. Penthouse and all are very costly but I found one unit that was okay in terms of pricing. Quality will be assured by DLF. I am just hoping that I can shift smoothly without any delays, since Phase-6 is a big development. They are giving luxury experience when you come to buy.

I will give full marks for the affordable prices. Now that most areas in Gurgaon are so costly, this is still well-connected on Dwarka Expressway but I was able to buy it at a better price in my opinion. Flat is yet to be ready so waiting to move in, although they have started deliveries. Good fit and finish overall of other apartments as I checked.

See, I have been very impressed that project is being developed so fast. Of course, my own unit is pretty well completed though I am yet to shift. They have given everything they promised. Not very happy with the approach road. Still, once construction is done, should be better. Area-wise, it's good enough, since my office is near Pataudi Road and it is accessible from here.

I have checked site area and it seems it is well-connected through Dwarka Expressway and NH-8. also like the fact that it's a low-rise development, with a design that is modern but still has some traditional touches. At least that's what I feel. Hoping to get my unit soon and move in

It is a win-win project for families, since community living facilities are good here and the project design and layout are also nice. Location-wise, it's the biggest USP, since the site is on the Dwarka Expressway itself. Also, there is lots of greenery all around, with NH-8 also nearby.

Delivery schedule is being maintained and developer brand value is of course there. Signature Global is a big name and certain quality you expect from their flats which is there I will be honest. But the location benefits, while you are there near the Expressway, there is a lot of traffic I see on the roads. Also, view from balconies has to be better. Now there is all construction and debris. Hope it improves soon.

I am happy with what I got and hence the full rating. As a shop owner, there is high footfall here thanks to the Galleries and Galaxy and they give me lot of traffic. Worth the price i think, especially with weekend crowd

Milestone 32nd Avenue offers a good place to do business. The shops are well-sized and the developer has given good quality. Also, the retail potential of the area justifies the price point and there is excellent appreciation prospect too.

Yes, shop rentals are quite high here. But I am hoping to get back my investment, since there is a good young crowd here. This comes from the co-working space and all the people coming for shopping and movies. The developer has given the amenities promised.

From location point of view, I think the investment is a decent one. I have started doing up my store here and footfalls are still okay. But traffic jam is a common occurrence and last-mile access to metro can be improved. No major complaints about fit and finish.

Quite satisfied with the quality of the units allotted to me. Not very far from metro and NH-48 and lots of people working in the co-working space in the area. Also, the shopping, dining, movies- it's a popular hangout. That's why I chose the location.

I am only hoping for a quick completion of the project. Otherwise, the good thing that made me book was the reputation of M3M. I have seen some of their projects. This one has a good blueprint. Also, Cyber City 2.0 is coming up nearby so area will appreciate from investment perspective.

Waiting to see what final shape the project will take. Developer is reliable so that's one positive but I think view from some buildings could be better (at least as per the plan). Also, there is possibility of traffic jam at the connection with the SPR. One good thing is that NH-8 is close by.

Construction pace is decent and that's a blessing. To be honest, I was looking for something near the SPR. Because I feel that's where Gurgaon is going to develop in coming years. This is only 5-6 mins away as I drove and found out myself. For me that was the biggest incentive and pricing is also okay I think.

My family thinks it's going to be a good investment touchwood. M3M has that quality and class and I trust them after going through so many reviews and all. Also, I am happy that in the area there is Cyber City coming up, American Express office is already running, SPR is nearby. Lots of location benefits that attracted me.

This is going to be a mega project once it is completed. I will recommend it to all families who are looking for a low-rise and luxury living in Gurgaon with two-side connectivity through the NH-8 and SPR sides. Lots of corporate offices nearby and all other amenities. It could be a good investment.

Well project is still being constructed, but I have invested for the location potential. Actually biggest incentive for me is that once you enter Dwarka Expressway, it is the first project you see. Also, Capital Mansion is right next door and I have learnt that it is a part of the 250-acre Delhi Airport Smart City Development. So I can expect appreciation in future.

This project is a good option if you are looking for something on the Dwarka Expressway without a huge price tag. Neighborhood-wise, it's within a smart city development and right on the highway itself. Golf course will be just at your fingertips and you can easily get all the amenities that are available at luxury high-rises at a relatively competitive price. I strongly recommend!

Something that motivated me to invest in this project was the great location. Right on the Expressway, boy it is great. I can reach my office quickly and developer's reputation is very strong as a brand. So that's another thing. Also, they are giving servant room with my unit, which was a must.

I am happy that I could invest in a project that offers such a good location. But infrastructure-wise I am finding that the area is yet to develop. Mixed-use development they are saying, but will take some time before smart city benefits come into play. Also, water supply is not good in the area so I have heard. Hoping for improvements before I move in.

Very happy with my sales experience is all I can say. Also took my wife many times to check out the area. Seems fine, Dwarka Expressway location is the main thing. Project layout and amenities seem great, especially the proposed golf course. Am also happy about so many schools nearby, seeing as we will need it for our infant son in future.

Wanted to stay on Sohna Road and this one is just near the Toll Plaza. So that was my reason to invest mainly along with the fact that the developer is a reputed name. Also, I am cool with the amenities and green space they are promising

So it is an investment that is mainly for the future potential. I am not shifting here for some time and will observe the pace of project completion and delivery. One good thing is the Aravalli Hills surrounding the area. But still lot to be done in terms of infrastructure and connectivity. Still new area. Hope it develops.

I will give a plus point for the way the developer is building this integrated township. Not many licenses are being given now and it is a chance to own an apartment in a township with everything that will come up from mall to school. That too it is a listed developer. Of course, the location is yet to become as A-list one as say Dwarka Expressway. But it will get there I believe.

Pricing is too high. There are some projects that cost less in same stretch. Yes, they are promising amenities and township living. Let's see how it ultimately becomes. On the plus side, I am happy that it's at least on the highway and the greenery that is being offered. Upcoming and quieter area, but will develop soon I hope.

I am very happy with my investment. South of Gurgaon is one of the most happening location and lot of projects here. I was advised to invest due to the township features, Aravalli backdrop, good layout and planning, and the good reputation of the developer. Hope it turns out well for me.

Have to say, the developer's track record is good. But am slightly apprehensive about the traffic on the Dwarka Expressway during rush hour. Also, while being on the highway is good, the area as a whole is yet to develop fully in comparison to say Golf Course road

I am betting on BPTP's ability to deliver the project based on the timeline they have mentioned. I am also attracted to the big size of the 3 BHK units here. Also good location just on the Dwarka Expressway, which will boost connectivity in my opinion.

Lots of amenities they are promising here and I hope they give. Pricing is okay in my opinion and I am also happy with the project being on the Dwarka Expressway itself. Many malls, schools, hospitals, business centers are all nearby. NH-8 and IGI Airport are also accessible, so that's a big plus.

Reason why I went for the project is because of the competitive price. It was within my budget and am willing to wait for completion. More affordable than many other areas. Also, I am pretty okay with the amenities and the location. Signal-free driving to my workplace seems fun!

Pataudi Road is just nearby and it is helpful in connecting to my office and child's school. Also, they will ultimately offer plenty of amenities that will benefit the family. Price seemed okay and so booked. Dwarka Expressway is now high-demand location and I think it's just what I need as future investment. Only hope is that it completes on time.

They have started delivery, my one is sometime later. Overall I am satisfied with pace of project completion. quality-wise, the focus is good and the developer is also promising many amenities. Location has a lot of future prospect, since Dwarka Expressway is very near.

Yes, M3M is a good developer. I will always praise them for the sales process. But what I am worried about is the view from the apartments. I don't think it's that great. Let's see once it completes and I get possession. Rest all is fine in terms of amenities and all.

Good thing is that Pataudi Road and Dwarka Expressway are both nearby. So reaching office will not be an issue for me at least once I move in and the project is done. I also like the low-rise apartment format since am scared of high rises.

Very happy that they have given a reasonable price at least I feel, considering the location. Very near to highway and other major road. Lots of amenities coming up in the area. Yes, it will take time to develop, but I have full faith in the potential of the Sector 89.

Sector 89 at this price seems little expensive. Also, slight bottlenecks I have seen at connection point of Pataudi Road. Rest things are nice in terms of what the developer is offering in terms of smart layout, amenities, and the support from thir end is good. They are very communicative also. M3M is reputed so hoping that it meets quality benchmarks once it is complete.

I was looking for something relatively budget-friendly to invest in. Went for it on the brand name of the developer. They will at least deliver the basic quality as I know. Yes area is developing but I work in Sarjapur so it seems like a good place to be in the future years.

I am happy about investing in this project. But I have some worries, since South Bangalore is still getting developed. Only hope that it becomes properly connected. Traffic congestion is also there on the road to Electronic City. Rest pricing and all are fine

On paper, looks like a good investment. Me and my wife both need access to Electronic City and it's still doable from here. Area is peaceful much like a village still and has that quiet vibe, though don't know how long it will stay. Looking forward to the speedy construction

Shriram is a reliable brand name in the Bangalore market. One more thing that attracted us was the location. North Bangalore is saturated I feel and South will grow in the future. So that's why putting my bets on this location. IT hubs are also quite accessible.

Shriram Group is one of the top builders in Bangalore and this one in South Bangalore comes with a good plan and layout. Big apartments, competitive rates, and most importantly, some great amenities. I will recommend since it is quite close to schools and SEZs.

It's like the perfect location on paper. I mean I work in the World Trade Centre so that's not very far from the project. It made perfect sense to live nearby. Who wants to spend time in traffic jams?
Buying for the brand name of the developer. Godrej is one name that gives me confidence and trust. Also, the location in Yeshwanthpur is a prime one and will develop more I feel in the future.

Can't wait for delivery, though it's still some time off. Happy with the big 4 BHK layout they are promising. Also am satisfied with the location, though some traffic bottlenecks still near Hebbal Road, but otherwise okay.

See, it all boils down to when the project will be completed, but seeing as it's Godrej, the premium seems justified. These guys have a track record of giving great amenities and excellent quality. Also happy that the Airport is not as far and there is a direct route to it.

Happy with purchase. The sales team is very supportive. Amenities promised are good and the Jakkur Aerrodrome and all are nearby. The WTC, Orion Mall and Hebbal Lake can also be accessed. Clearly, it's a location worth making investment for future.

I think it is worth investing in Whitefield and I am attracted by the 40+ lifestyle amenities. They have planned this cluster on the ground floor and I think it is exciting. Also the area itself is a buzzing one, although some traffic congestion is there.

Wanted to live in Whitefield and finally buy a flat here. I work in Whitefield and children's schools are also nearby. Invested in this for my children due to so many facilities they are promising. It's a reputed developer so I hope they deliver.

Satisfactory experience with sales team of developer. They are a big name as I can see and I am hopeful that they will give us the quality we need. One thing is that metro stations are slightly far and that's where I hope last-mile connections will come up even more.

I was always interested in Whitefield since I have lived here on rent earlier. So project made sense, considering it is Sowparnika, a well-known builder. Area around project is not as peaceful but still I think it will be worth it. Prices are within my budget so why not.

I was looking for lifestyle need and then finally came upon this project. Can access so many malls nearby including my favorite one- Phoenix. Also, my office is not that far so I think the commute is doable. Reason to invest is the location I think.

When entered project site, two manmade lakes got attention. Offering peaceful living and pricing is also competitive for upcoming location. I liked the access to airport which is the main USP. Multiple apartment options and found one to suit my needs.

Very good payment plan of developer. They are very understanding. Also, Embassy school is itself nearby, which is good option if I wish to start family later on. The area site is big and living in township will be a nice experience I feel.

Devanahalli everyone is saying that it is next big thing. So many projects here but I finally went with Embassy since it's a big name. They will give quality I think and their apartment layouts are of many types. I got the perfect size of flat without having to pay more and go for a bigger one.

I will strongly recommend to all families. It's the location which is a standout, near the airport and many other business hubs. In fact, Devanahalli Business Park is also nearby. What is also great are the lifestyle amenities and the township experience.

First thing was that in-laws stay just beyond the airport. So we had to be close to them. Second point was the affordable price for my budget at least. Third point was the huge campus with the township amenities. Last point was flexible payment option which works for me.

Location, location, location. Just take a drive on the Mysore Road. You will find the medical college nearby and metro station is coming up opposite to it. Also, the 6-laning is happening for the road. So best place to invest in my opinion.

Seemed like a good investment. ACS Engineering College, girls school, medical college, supermarkets. Everything is in the area. And most importantly metro. Who does not want to stay near metro. So I invested.

Always wanted to live near metro, since no point taking the car and spending hours in traffic jams. This project is right on point since metro and bus terminus are nearby and Big Basket departmental store is also there. Many stores also and educational institutions. Confident about the project.

Really it is the only project with its forest inside the campus. Really something that touched me once I visited the site and it will only become more beautiful in the future. That was the light bulb moment for me. Want my kids to grow up in this ambience.

What a nice way they have planned the layout. The forest walk, campus are all so nice. Developer is a big name, location is Mysore Road. Yes some traffic jam is there, but never mind, metro and bus terminus is also nearby. I think it's a perfect one to buy.

First thing that got me hooked was the project location just close to the airport toll gate. I have faced problem in the past trying to reach the airport on time. This will hopefully solve the problem. Standard amenities are given and pricing seems fine.

See what I wanted was somewhere near the airport. Size and all slight compromise I was okay with but this was not the case. They gave decent plan. So it worked for me. I am a frequent flier and have to travel every week.

I will give it a five-star for location. As a buyer I am hopeful about the prospect of staying here. My office is nearby and they are planning this mega township which i know will work out since it's Godrej.

Very nice experience with Godrej team. They explained everything so well and the trust is there. See they are a big developer after all. My wife was keen on staying near the airport and we finally came here after looking at many other North Bangalore projects.

It is Godrej so no questions asked on that count. Area-wise, it's peaceful enough now but will be buzzing later. Airport is nearby and the lakeside is also accessible which is a big plus point for morning walks and all. Hoping that upcoming metro is done soon (they are saying it will be there by 2026) so fingers crossed.

You can call it offshoot of Whitefield. Main highway running near project and good access to multiple IT parks in the area. Also, the suburban rail and metro expansion could benefit the area in the future. So thought of putting an investment down for future years.

Metro stations are too far away from project and proposed expansion will take time. Also, traffic issue is there due to Whitefield Main Road. But otherwise, developer plans are good enough and I am hoping life gets better once we finally start living here (once project is done)

See what attracted me to this project of course was the good budget and then I saw that they are giving decetn amenities also. Payment plans are also good enough. I work in Whitefield and my office happens to be 15-20 mins from the project. Willing to live with that!

I am counting on the project being a success. The highway and Whitefield main road are there nearby, IT parks are well-connected, and what's more important, the project layout seems quite modern and not outdated. So, to me, it is a good bet for my money.

Would have loved a more family-friendly and buzzing community. But it will get there. Already traffic volume is quite high on the stretch. But husband works nearby so we had to prioritize the location. Amenities seem nice if they deliver what they promise.

Would like to add one thing that influenced my decision. A family member of mine has previously bought with the developer in another project. His experience made me also determined to invest here. And also Devanahalli was a natural choice since I anyway rent nearby so buying is better choice for long-term stability.

What's not to like? I mean, I was impressed with the scale of what they are offering. And the airport is so close. The Fantasy Golf Resort is a place I visit frequently. So put together it's a good place for peaceful living.

Overall fine. I mean my husband is more into this than me. Metros are far away although upcoming connectivity projects are there. But still, there is easy airport access, something which may help us in future. Also, there are some colleges and all nearby so location could boom in future.

Budget did it for me. I mean the location or Devanahalli area is itself booming now. So locking in the price now made perfect sense. I work not very far away from the place and the Bangalore airport connectivity is the biggest USP

Massive infra push by Government as seen in area. It has now transformed completely. Was awestruck at seeing the pace of construction once we went for site visit. Project location is a little far off from mainstream but still near the airport so that's like a huge plus.

If you are looking at South Bangalore, this is probably a great choice. I will recommend for its access to so many landmarks, you take the Delhi Public School, Forum Mall, Dayanand Sagar University, upcoming IKEA Store. They are all within only 10 minutes from here.

I live in Kanakupura Road myself, slightly off from this project. So, was looking for proper budget project in locality itself. Found the layout nice and location is very near to Forum Mall which is like a hangout for us. Went ahead.

Hopeful of Kanakapura Road developing further with PRR and metro corridor implemented. So investing now since there will be price rise in next 2-3 years. As an investor I feel it is a place worth betting on.

What they are promising feels good enough. I hope they execute. But that said, some positives are the Kanakapura Main Road access you get although my office in Electronic City is quite far away. Willing to make the compromise since the budget and amenities are good.

No reason to dislike really. Invested since I was looking for something near my parents place. They live quite nearby and they were the ones who asked me to take a look. Happy with what I see and of course, my son is studying in Dayanand Sagar nearby so that's another incentive.

The developer is a well-known name and I am happy with the payment plan they are offering. Good part is that upcoming metro station is less than 10 minutes away from the project. So may be a good option for future connectivity.

It's all about location. International Airport is very near to the project and so is the Phoenix Mall of Asia. Bhartiya Mall is also accessible and so is future metro station. So wanted something that would give good value down the line in case I wish to upgrade.

Budget seemed fine considering what they are giving. It is a reliable developer since other people have bought from them quite smoothly. Now area-wise I am satisfied since I already live nearby on rent and know its future potential.

Developer is giving plenty of options for configuration and you don't have to spend more than you can. That was the good part for me. However, some traffic congestion I saw and it is still some time for metro station to develop. If connectivity is resolved, it will become great location in future.

See these guys are mostly reliable developers and I found the unit I wanted at a good price. Also, the area itself was a major attraction. There are many malls nearby and Kogilu Road is also right nearby. So, the big thing for me was the easy access to the airport. I fly often so it makes sense really. Oh and Manipal is also nearby

East Bangalore has always been a dark horse of property market. This one falls in Whitefield and was my chosen option after comparing many other new launches. Two main reasons- one is the potential of the location after PRR, STRR, Metro expansion, etc. Second is that project has started construction already and the quality they are giving is nice.

Project size is massive and already buildings are coming up fast. I can see the open space and the budget is okay at least with my situation. The clubhouse will be up to 28,000 sq. ft. with infinity pool that is attracting me. Location-wise, slightly far from metro, but will improve in future.
Right near to DPS you will see it as you drive past. The STRR is slightly far away but still accessible. Also, one good thing is the area has lot of family-friendly society so that helps.

It is going to be a big project as I can see myself. Purple line extension of metro is going to give the area a massive boost. Then PRR project is also there. My Whitefield office is also not very far so that's one good thing.

You may find it to be a slightly upcoming area, with amenities not very developed as of yet. But prospect is very good, if you consider location potential. STRR is not far and upcoming metro corridor will pass through also. Am betting on the project.

Budget-wise I found it good, because Devanahalli is such an emerging location. This project is only about 7 km from airport. Something that will suit me since I travel quite often on work. Also, it's part of this big township with multiple developers so going to be happening area soon

I like the fact that Birla is developing it. It gives a layer of trust that not all developers can give. It's India's leading company so they can assure of quality. Also, I have heard my office is shifting to Devanahalli near airport so having home here will benefit me.

Approach road is narrow. I have heard it is going to be widened. But still some time before it happens. Once done, it will be easier to go to Hebbal and Bellary Road. Otherwise, project pricing and value proposition are fine.

I am excited about 45,000 sq. ft. clubhouse that they are promising here. Also the green area that is there in the layout. Location wise, KIADB Tech Park is nearby and it's a good thing from future perspective. The metro station is about 3 km away too.

My budget was spot on and I could find the good project for my needs. Developer is a reputed one and that's an advantage. Personally speaking, I am more into buying here since the airport is not that far.

Personally I am all for it. Had the budget and was looking at Andheri for some time. JVLR connectivity is my main thing since I use it to go to office. Also, the aqua gym and all they are promising is quite enticing. Let's see how it works out.

JVLR and WEH are nearby so that's like a big plus for me. Pricing may seem slightly high, but Andheri West is now becoming a prime area in Mumbai. Flat sizes are good enough and I feel that area-wise, it's a family-friendly spot to settle.

Am interested in the potential of the Andheri West area. As an old investor in the market, I know a good project when I see one. Huge buzz regarding DLF's first such luxury launch in Mumbai market. So, it's a win-win. If you see, the airport, highway, metro lines, everything is near.

My biggest interest while looking at flats here was how close the metro line was. It is a good thing from future point of view. Also, the society seems to be planned well, since it's DLF. Area is good and I know because my aunt also lives in Andheri West.

Once the project is done, I will be shifting from SoBo, where I currently pay a huge amount in rent. It will be a good investment for future. Society is going to have all amenities and Western Express highway, metro line 1 and 2A are all nearby. Fun Republic Mall is also just nearby. So good deal I think

First thing that attracted me was the fact that project is just at intersection of LBS Marg and JVLR. Now I can commute better once I start living here. Also they are promising a spacious and green society which appeals to me.

Good bet since K Raheja is a famous name in Mumbai building market. I was recommended to take a site visit and once I did, liked the location very much. Main thing is Eastern Express Highway can be accessed easily and that's a big bonus. Anything around highway works in Mumbai

Pricing seemed slightly high to me, but location is also coming up fast. May be worth my investment in the future, since the JVLR and highway are nearby. Good thing for me is that railway station is very near and also Godrej IT Park where I work

Am living in Vikhroli at the moment. Kanjurmarg West seemed a good location from neighborhood point of view. Mumbai metro line 14, once it becomes reality, will make area costlier and hence better buy now and lock prices.

See am going with the reputation of the developer. I have seen their projects and they choose very nicely connected locations. This one too is near the railway station and major roads, while you will also find multiple office parks in the vicinity. This makes it a good bet for future investment which is may main motive.

Am basically putting a bet on the location of the project. Went for it since pricing seemed right after comparing with other projects in the area. Malad station being near to the project is one big advantage and metro line 2B may also be a good thing in future.

An upcoming metro station is being built as I found out, quite near to the project. So will be helpful for future generation, now that Mumbai is all about traffic jams and cars. Also I like the project plan they have put up.

Pricing seems on the higher side for bigger units. At least that's what I feel. The metro line is coming up but no clarity on when competion will be done. I still think airport could be nearer. Now it will take an hour or more in peak traffic. What made me happy was access to Western Express Highway

There are many positive things about this project. First the developer is one of India's top company. Then I will mention how you will have private living experience with only 46 units here. More greenery and private space. Also family will appreciate so many schools nearby like Billabong.

Had so many doubts at first. It's a big investment right? But went ahead since the location seems very appealing. Metro line is coming up with a station near the project and WEH and JVLR can be accessed along with Malad station. Will be less anxious about parents since Zenith and other hospitals are also nearby.

Happy to have spent on my dream apartment. Now can't wait to have it ready in the future. Vile Parle was always my dream location since my mom grew up here and I know the place pretty well. As for practical aspects, location is home to elite crowd and SV Road is also nearby, which is another plus point.

One of the good things about the project is the reliability of the developer. It has been around for a long time. At the same time, I liked the fact that the SV Road and upcoming metro station are both nearby. Another thing that attracted me was the proximity to the Mothercare Hospital (just a short walk)

Vile Parle West location is the biggest highlight of the project. Amrapali Shopping Center, Mothercare Hospital, CP Goenka, Park View Hotel- Lots of landmarks as you drive to the site. WEH can be accessed easily and also SV Road. Practical wise as a mother with children I like the society plan they are offering.

Everything is just perfect at least that's what I feel. Pricing is right for the location and developer has a solid reputation also for quality and delivery. My wife was so happy about SV Road location, since she works nearby. It will help her come back home quickly and even attend to children when need is there in the future

True ultra-luxury category. What else can I say. We as a family have invested here and are hoping for some good return in the future. Campus, flat size, amenities- everything is on point and I know they will deliver. SV Road and WEH connectivity, upcoming metro on SV Road, hospital, school- everything is nearby. Upgrading from Borivali to be near my office

Funny thing is I live myself near Gandhi Nagar Junction. So, when this project came up, had to invest and we were looking for some time. Will be a good future home once it is done. Western Express Highway access is so smooth and good part is that they are promising rooftop cafe, dining and all luxury amenities.

Well it is brand Lodha. Who does not know about them. So it was natural that when we wanted to invest in some place along Western Express Highway at decent budget, this project fits the bill. Husband is very happy that LBS Road is only 500 metres away, since his office will be closer once we move in the future.

Families should buy into this project. I myself am very impressed with how Lodha is building the project. Design is very international in its look and feel and apartment designs are intelligent. Commute will be smooth due to the Highway and LBS Road while Eastern Express Highway is also accessible.

Was looking for an apartment in Mumbai near a metro station. This one is just a walk from the Gandhi Nagar station on the Line 4 and since I work in Powai, it is also pretty much accessible from here. Eastern Express Highway is quicker to access and direct route is there to WEH also.

Will only give five-star rating since my parents stay in Lodha project already in other part of Mumbai. Very good quality and facility they give. What is also great for me is Highway access and LBS Road, more than nearby metro and railway station. Even husband who works in BKC is happy about investing here.

I trust this developer. Godrej is one of biggest developers in the country. So investment in their project only was something to do. I already know the area well and use the Western Express Highway which is also nearby. So good future prospect here.

Godrej Properties is offering a spacious layout and lots of open space at this project. You can find the Kanidvali station nearby which many people will find useful for work commuting. Also, the highways and roads are all there along with malls like Growels and Centrum. So it's a good family-friendly option.

Happy overall with my investment and pace of construction seems quite fast. Expected as it is Godrej. Sales team was very helpful. They solved all my doubts and this made me invest. Payment plan is also convenient

I already live in Kandivali and was wanting an upgrade from our 90s-time flat. This one is the ideal opportunity if you look at the budget. Very close to all the malls here and also hospitals. Kandivali station is also in proximity and my friends, office (run a business) and relative all are here. So makes sense for my future settlement.

Hope that Godrej fully execute what they are promising. They have done it before and are Mumbai company. Appreciation potential is great due to upcoming Thane-Borivali tunnel and coastal road. Station and highway are also nearby along with all the amenities. Families will want it so keeping my fingers crossed for investment.

First thing I notice as I go to project site is the huge space they have. It's a rare thing in Mumbai. Navi Mumbai is growing fast and the pricing they have is very smart. I like it and so have invested. Lot of greenery in area which is another attraction for me.
I think main attraction for me is Thane-Belapur Road nearby. I take this road regularly every morning and it is so near the complex. Also developer team was very helpful and explain everything fine

Am hoping that the developer completes it as he is saying. The plan is really attractive. Somehow price-wise feel I am getting good value from this. Eastern Express Highway is not very near but not very far also so that's a plus point.

Wanted to move away from noise and pollution of Mumbai. This one looks to be a better alternative. Yes it's in bustling area, but still little less crowd. Plenty of greens and the flats are bigger for lesser price. So went with it.

Invested here since budget was fitting. But still little worried about connectivity. Yes, schools, hospitals and roads are near but lot of development in works I hope. Let's hope our investment works out fine.

I already rent in the area and know how it is a peaceful one. So wanted to finally settle and buy a flat here only. Good thing is that Mumbai-Bangalore Highway is near so lot of development coming up on that stretch.

Developer team was cordial. Sales process was smooth and I hope it starts fast. Lotus Business School, Podar school and other institution are nearby. Good family-friendly area so I think worth an investment.

Good location in Pune. I can go easily to Kalewadi Main Road and Highway from here. Metro line 3 expansion may also be good for the area in future. For now, travelling will be easy once project completes. Lots of malls and all also nearby.

Found Vision One Mall and D Mart not very far from project. Infosys and Wipro office people will find it convenient also. PMC is also widening road here to make traffic flow better. So investment-wise I found it good enough.

It's an excellent location if you consider how the metro line will come up here. The Highway access is there, major roads, hospitals, schools, shopping centres, and even offices. Everything you want is not very far and also project layout is very spacious. So I will definitely recommend.

I live in Wakad myself and the next big upgrade was this once I compared multiple options. Developer is a very big one and connectivity-wise it is nice for me, since I work in Hinjewadi. So that's all I wanted. Also bonus that Phoenix and other malls are nearby.

Was looking for family feeling once at site. Kids and husband will love it I know. They are promising many amenities and developer is a reputed one too. Main USP is Mumbai-Bangalore Highway is near for commute and Kalewadi Main Road is also not too far.

To be practical, clients will like the location in Wakad. It is very well connected to Hinjewadi and WTC along with EON IT Park. Many schools and malls in vicinity and Mumbai-Bangalore Highway is just off the site. Price point is attractive. Only thing is that airport is slightly far but that's doable.

Wife took me along for site visit one day. she was already impressed in her mind. I asked all critical questions but developer team was able to answer. Vilas Javdekar is reputed name and location was not far from my workplace in EON IT Park. So happy to invest here. Visited Phoenix Mall of the Millennium from here. It's not too far also.

Pune Metro Line 3 and Pune Ring Road may be game-changer for the area. So makes sense to invest now in project and keep faith that it will work out. Also developer is big name. All amenities are here and so many hospitals nearby like Lifepoint Multispecialty.

I am a proud Tathawade resident for many years. So when finally wanted to buy flat, wanted it in same area. This developer is good enough and the project plan impressed me with forest trail and whatnot. Also location-wise, Mumbai-Bangalore Highway is nearby, which will give good value in future.

Chinchwad Junction is not very far but still accessible. That's where I go for work. Also, project offers good investment opportunity I felt. Lot of open space and greenery inside they are building. Pricing point is fair I think.

My child studies in Akshara International School and has just enrolled. So I found this to be convenient while looking for a home in Pune. Husband works in Tech Mahindra which is also accessible. So we will be sorted once we move into the society.

If you think about it, location-wise, it's slightly far from airport. But if you don't fly all that frequently, you will like it. Highway and Kalewadi Main Road is there in area and also Pulse and Lifecare Hospitals. Those working in Wipro will find it a good project option too.

Very  happy with the sales experience of the developer. Very understanding they are about payment plans and all. Booked on spot after driving around whole area and seeing connection to the Highway, Kalewadi road, malls and all nearby.

This project is worth investing in, especially if you work in Hinjewadi. Hinjewadi Road is only a few minutes away from the site and you will also find all the malls, hospitals, schools and other infrastructure nearby. Developer is reputed one and upcoming metro line will boost the value also.

For me, it was an emotional decision to buy, since my uncle's house is in the same area and I am very attached to him. Found this project to be okay in terms of pricing and the distance to office is also not too far. Society amenities will be helpful in future when I start family

Developer behavior was very nice. Told me everything I needed and that too in very simple way. Price and payment plan are also okay for me which motivated investment decision. Hinjewadi Main Road is just nearby and I am appreciating the approach road also.

Wanted to invest somewhere near my office in Hinjewadi. This one is near the main road and I hear of the Metro Line 3 passing nearby. So, connectivity-wise, it's not too bad right now although traffic is going up every day. Also value-wise I felt it matches our budget

I was very attracted by the 2.5 acre Central Park they are promising in the project and also by the reliability of the developer. But one thing that is USP according to me is the Hinjewadi IT Park nearby. this will save a lot of time for me and I like the fact that D-Mart and many other malls are also there.
Wanted to invest somewhere near Wakad Road. This project site is only a kilometer or so as I found out. So worked for me and price point was comfortable also.

I was so happy when I drove to the project. The Wakad Road is so accessible and so is the Mumbai-Bangalore Highway. Metro line is coming up nearby and it will make the area more buzzing. So better lock in prices now by investing. Which is what I did.

Family-friendly is the word that came to my mind when I thought of this project. The developer is very reliable as I have friends working in that company who tell me about everything they are doing. The whole area is filled with hospitals like Jupiter, schools like MITCON and all, and so many shopping centers.

This project is one that is not hard to pitch to people. They are liking the beautiful location and also the prospect of the locality seeing the metro line, near to Wakad Road, etc. Amenity-wise, everything is there and forest-style podium is also finding a lot of takers.
Happy with my booking experience so far. Great location just on the Mula River. It is so peaceful and serene. Can imagine sitting here on moonlit night once the project is complete and I move in.

Krisala 41 Commune is in a very good location in Hinjewadi. Shop here will do good business and 24-7 power backup is there so no worries of interruption. Hinjewadi Road is there within 1 km and it makes the location very viable.

Have invested to expand my retail business for the future. Location seems good since I live nearby and was looking for something close to home that will be ready in next few years. Hinjewadi Road and Highway are both nearby and upcoming metro line will boost the area I hope.

I am hopeful of the location getting good value once the metro is complete and the project is developed. While that's still far away am still happy that it is near many offices like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, and all. So footfall should be good in coming days.

Location is very nice just off Mumbai-Bangalore Highway. And Hinjewadi Road is nearby. Lot of IT offices and corporates in the area and that may make it a strategic investment for me. Hope that the developer completes on time. Price-wise am satisfied.

Gera Imperium and other shopping centers are nearby while there are several IT offices also. I can personally travel fast through the highway and Hinjewadi road. Metro line in the future will ultimately make the project more viable. So investment-wise am hoping for the best.

I am right now very happy with my investment. The water body adds a nice appeal to this project. Also, the developer is Godrej and they are known for the quality. So, I made the investment, especially since office is only within 20-30 minutes

First thing that I wanted was near Hinjewadi IT Park and also the main road. I work in Nisarg IT Park and wife works in Rajiv Gandhi. So that's why this project made the ideal sense for us in terms of future living perspective.

Husband wanted somewhere near water body. He was very particular about this and greenery. The icing on the cake was that we were already staying in Hinjewadi since we both work in IT Park nearby. This project offers good location and we won't have to move much away from the earlier convenient area.

I am a newcomer in Pune and have set up a business in the Wakad area. While it is not at the doorstep, it is still very accessible from the project. Also, Godrej is a big developer and in my home city it has many projects also. Good choice I feel for my future in this city. I want to stay at least 15-20 years and hope project is delivered quickly.

Developer was very cooperative especially for payment. Water body, all the amenities, water plaza, etc. are very attractive. Godrej I know will deliver and IT Park is also very near. Grand High Street is a good hangout and it was not very far as I found while driving from the site.

Biggest draw for me was being part of a project in mega township High-Tech City and Codename Blue Waters. It will give access to lots of amenities. Infosys Circle is also a walk away, which is another benefit. I think it will serve me well in future.

Yes, the Pune railway station and airport are quite far from this project. I knew that but we still invested since it is affordable and within our budget. Also, I am happy about the amenities and project plan. They are also located near Baner and Balewadi, which is one advantage.

Developer was very helpful and cooperative. Project site is big and lots of facilities here that my kids will ultimately enjoy once it is ready. Also I can say that my office in Hinjewadi is accessible from here. Kids school is also well-connected. So we are sorted as a family.

Pune Ring Road and metro lines will ultimately improve connectivity in the surrounding area. It's not direct but still will have an impact. Also, the Hinjewadi Phase 1 is nearby along with Baner. For us as a family, it makes for a good investment, since it's fast-growing area.

I did not think of investing at this moment at first. But parents prevailed on me saying that you should do it now before price goes up. You have to start family, etc. So, went for it and was hooked. Very good area with many families. My office in Baner is not far and many social amenities also. Happy with purchase.

ProjectName: Gera Joy On The Tree Tops
Description: I am planning to start family and have child in near future and it will be ready by then I hope. So, Gera is a reputed developer and the child centric concept they are giving is a big attraction for me at least. Hinjewadi Road is only 500 meters drive and will help with commuting.

ProjectName: Gera Joy On The Tree Tops
Description: Was looking for strategic area near Hinjewadi and that's where the project works well. Mumbai-Bangalore Highway is around 8-9 km while Hinjewadi Road is right beside. Hinjewadi IT Park and many offices are also in the area. So it suits me as a professional here.

ProjectName: Gera Joy On The Tree Tops
Description: I will give a lot of marks for concept they have planned. It will bring more families. Also if you are working in Hinjewadi, it is the perfect property. Plenty of amenities for your child and also for family. The Mumbai-Bangalore Highway is not that far also.

ProjectName: Gera Joy On The Tree Tops
Description: What I went for is the reputation of the developer Gera. These guys have done some good projects in the past. Also, the Hinjewadi Road, IT Park, and Xion Mall are nearby. Grand High Street is a short drive away. I think I will benefit from future investing here.

ProjectName: Gera Joy On The Tree Tops
Description: I stay near Pune railway station so this location is quite far from there. Airport is also not near. Metro line still clarity needed on how it will benefit residents. But I invested due to reasonable budget and good project plan and amenities. Am betting on some good growth in future here.

See Ghodbunder is the hottest location right now in Mumbai-Thane market. So it was a natural choice when I looked at other options. Pricing seems fair and my main attraction was the fact that the airport is about 30-35 minutes away. That does it for me since I fly frequently and can't stay near the airport due to obvious rate issues.

This project developer was very friendly and communication was nice from beginning. Has kept updated on progress also. It took me around 10-15 minutes to go to the Eastern Express Highway from here. So that part is fine and G Corp Tech Park is nearby, lot of interest from IT guys here.

I wanted to invest in one property in Thane and this project was the ideal option in terms of size and the configuration I am getting. Upcoming metro line will boost property price I feel and also the Eastern Express Highway is near. Poddar International and many other schools are there so family wise it's also a good deal.

I will strongly recommend to all clients in Thane and even in MMR looking for good-budget and spacious layout. You can easily go to Eastern Express Highway, WEH is also accessible, metro is coming up, all hospitals like Wockhardt nearby. Good from future appreciation point of view.

Ghodbunder was always my main choice as a Thane resident for so long. This project appealed for its easy access to my office through the Eastern Express Highway. It takes me less than one hour. Malls and hangouts are not that far and project amenities are also good.

For me, it was always about investing somewhere where the connectivity via train would be good. So this one is firstly Kalpataru which is a reputed name and secondly the Mira Road station is a few minutes away. So I can reach office in Churchgate without difficulty once I start living here in future.

I prefer trains over cars any day and with Mira Road station nearby, it will be easy to go to Virar where I work. I also drove to the Western Express Highway and it really is just 5-6 minutes away from the project. So, connectivity-wise it ticked all my boxes for investment.

Kalpataru is brand name that I opted for. I was looking at Mira Road for relatively reasonable price and glad I got it. So, amenities are good and also the best part for me personally is that I work in Malad. So it's not hard to connect there. Train station is nearby and metro also.

I thought of going for this one from a future investment perspective. It is because of the fact that the location is highly convenient. You have the station, the metro, the WEH and all major roads. There are schools and hospitals within 5-10 minutes as I found out. Thakur Mall is also nearby as I found out.

Full marks for the location they have chosen. I am a big fan of Sanjay Gandhi National Park and it's only 5-6 km from here. Also, Highway is close by and so is metro. Wife takes train daily to work so rail station nearby is also a plus. School and hospital within few minutes makes overall area very peaceful and prestigious.

So Agra Road and Ghodbunder Road parts are doing very well in Thane. I came upon this project suddenly and thought of investment. See we all need more space when we increase family and this may be the right solution. Happy with the location since I work out of home and won't have to travel much.

Developer brand name is no comparison to many other. I was happy with the service and sales support I got. They were really cooperative. Also, one more thing- the Ghodbunder Road is very near to the project. This is good since I am working here only.

Am happy with the project plan that the developer is giving and also the brand reputation. But my only worry is connectivity and traffic jam both. Ghodbunder Road is near but still lot more needed in terms of metro-like transport and rail station access. Let's hope it works out for me in the future.

First thing I noticed while driving to the project was the bus stops nearby. This is a good thing in my opinion since I do a lot of bus travel. And then Ghodbunder and Agra Roads are nearby. Atlantis and Zenith Hospitals are just nearby which is another plus since I have ageing parents.

Developer is very reputed and is offering nice payment plan. My daughter studies in Orchids which is a few minutes from society. So I invest here since we are already living on rent nearby. Also Ghodbunder Road is not very far where my sister lives. All in all good investment from my family POV.

I basically commute through Dahisar railway station every morning and stay with a friend nearby. Was thinking for long to buy my own place and finally this one fits my need. It is near the railway station and also the Western Express Highway is also near should I want to take car out on weekend. Good investment I think

I work in Infinity IT Park and the site was not very far from the project. I drove myself to find out whether it is feasible or not. Then Mira Road and Dahisar stations are nearby and MIra Bhayander Road is also well-connected. So I thought that location is booming now why not invest now before prices rise.

It's a gem of a project I found once I visited the site. Developer team is so friendly and I could get the right budget and payment plan that has made me stress-free. I think these little things are important when it's a new project.

Personally speaking, it's a good project in Mira Road. Firstly stations and WEH are nearby and secondly many offices and all are easily accessible. Many schools and hospitals within walking distance also. Very stylish and modern layout. So recommendable for families and professionals.

Found it attractive from budget point of view. I think they are designing the space very intelligently and let's see how it comes out finally. Location-wise I am aware since I live here. I take the train from Mira Road station and often travel on Mira-Bhayander Road. These two places are nearby. My child studies in convent school nearby so everything worked out fine.

I have been wanting to invest in Mira Road for a long time now. So, one thing that attracted me to the project is that it is a good and well-known developer. Also, project plan and pricing are quite fair in my opinion. I am happy that Western Express Highway is just 0.5 km away from site. I use it every day for commuting.

Have been renting in the area for many years now. Finally time to build my own nest. JP team was very supportive and helpful. Pricing fit my budget and I can take the Mira Road within 1 km easily. So, my office space is nearby and the amenities they are promising here are good enough.

I am happy about investing in this project. My son already studies in Podar International which is just near the site. Many other schools and hospitals are nearby. My office is also reachable through Western Express Highway. All in all a good deal at its price point.

See I am happy about investing for the value appreciation prospect. Developer seems good and most importantly, the pricing is reasonable. But while WEH and Mira Road are accessible, lot more connectivity and infra needed. Also, approach road needs to be improved.

My wife was the one who motivated me to finally take the plunge. There are many hospitals and schools I found on the route, which make it a family-friendly and peaceful area. Also, the highway is just near and so is the Mira Road. I think it's a good place to stay in Mumbai-Thane belt.

Very happy with what I saw in terms of site. Construction is already on and satisfied with the pace of it. Yes, location is helpful, since I work on Ghodbunder Road. It is nearby and also the railway station is about 15 minutes away as I found myself.

Developer layout seems good and sales team was very cooperative. Also, the pricing seems fair depending on the layout they are giving. Also, I am very intersted that Viviana and Korum Malls are all nearby and so many schools also. This is a big incentive for future investment.

Drove to the site from Ghodbunder Road. Distance is not as much and I am hoping that strategic location will boost future value once we ultimately move here. Also, the Thane railway station is not that far. So I can depend on it for connection to Mumbai in future.

The Majiwada area has been growing fast and some traffic is also going up. But overall peaceful neighborhood and many family also investing here. Giving me confidence to shift here in future once project completes. Very interested in mini golf and all they will give here.

Lots of amenities they are promising. I am hopeful that it will turn out well once they complete. Construction is going on and developer is prompt with the updates also. Location-wise I already stay here and go office daily through station. So lifestyle-wise, satisfied.

See I am investing here for two reasons. One is the location. It will take off in future mark my words. The two roads are running nearby, the Titwala Ambivali Road and the Murbad to Kalyan Road. There is railway station in proximity. Lots of social amenities coming up. Second reason is the reputation of the developer.

It is Godrej after all. These people are like the biggest brand in this area. My father wanted to invest in their project for a long time. Happy that this one finally synced with our budget. The developer team is very helpful also. Talking about future life here once it is done, the railway station is not that far and that is our lifeline.

I was tracking this project launch and am one of the early booking people. I am positive about future prospect of Ambivali, since there is still space for development. Plenty of greens they are offering in society with good amenities. Also, many local school and hospital within 10-15 minute radius here.

Drove to the project along Kalyan-Murbad Road and entry to site is smooth. Overall road condition is fine and they are making improvements also. Titwala-Ambivali Road is also near the site and it will be helpful to reach my workplace. Overall am happy with what they are promising.

Will give good rating based on what I have experienced during booking process and reliable nature of the Godrej company. The design and layout is good and flat will have good view hopefully. Also, am happy with the location. Convenience store, school- all is there in the area if you want to move with family.

Very happy so far with experience while booking. Dosti Group is well-known in MMR region and project plan seems attractive enough. For me, I anyway live near Agra Road and the connection to it was a natural incentive for not moving far away from my original home. Now let's see how soon they complete.

Was looking at an investment opportunity in Thane and this seems like a good location. Balkum is coming up and lots of infra being developed in the area. The Ghodbunder Road is about 15-20 minutes away as I found and it helps, since you can get the better connectivity.

Project-wise, it's a fair priced one with a nice design and good amenities that Dosti is offering. But I am still a little worried about the area developing fast enough by the time the project is completed. Yes, there are roads nearby but railway station I feel is slightly far.

I am really excited about flat getting completed in near future and moving into the project. Developer is trusted name so that made me invest and most importantly, can take Ghodbunder and Agra Road easily. My son studies in Narayana E-Techno school in the area and we were already living close by. So it makes for a good investment.

See, upcoming road improvements and metro work may make this area more attractive in future with higher value. That's why I invested. So many schools and hospitals near the site and the drive is overall smooth also. Also, one thing is that it is big developer so hope for hassle-free experience till completion.

Happy about making an investment here in Sector 36. Sobha is a big name which convinced me to invest. Was happy about the layout and amenities on offer here and best part is that the Greater Noida Link Road is only a few minutes from the site. This makes my commute smooth and happy about investing here.

Was excited about finally buying a home in Greater Noida and Sector 36 seemed like the perfect option. Took site tour and explored the area. It was very easy to get to Yamuna Expressway or the Greater Noida Link Road. Venice Mall is also nearby and this is another incentive.

See, Delta 1 and Pari Chowk metros are not close by, but they are not very far away. Closeness to Yamuna Expressway is the main USP and I found that my office can be reached in just 30 minutes from here. This was a big deal for me and also the amenities they are offering. Went ahead as a result.

Everything was likeable for me here. Sobha developer is very big company. They give a confidence and price of project is fair. The Noida-Greater Noida Expressway is running near the site and the LInk Road will help you access many areas faster also. Good investment I feel.

Good developer, good price, and good amenities. Happy to inves here. But little worried about last-mile connectivity since metro is slightly far and many other amenities need to be there in area. But school, hospital, mall are all nearby so hopeful that it becomes A-list area soon.

This is a well-developed area and I find that Pari Chowk is so near. At the same time, Yamuna Expressway access takes only a few minutes. I personally feel that location is only going to appreciate in future. Good developer and amenities promised are nice.

Investing here seems like a good decision for me. The project is being made by a reputed developer and I like the sports and other amenities. Location-wise, needed to stay close to Expressway and it is very close to project site. So that is the biggest win-win for me.

Project seems fine and I invested for fair price and layout. But metro and all seem little far. Yes, offices and schools are there, but I think traffic congestion will be a problem unless they widen link roads more and make it move smoothly.

Eldeco is a good developer and sales team was very helpful and cooperative. Project amenities are nice and I am happy that the new international airport is accessible from here. It will be a help for me. Also, the Eastern Peripheral Expressway is connected to area and so is Noida-Greater Noida Expressway. So connectivity-wise, lots of options.

Location seems very nice and family-friendly. I invested because I work in Wipro nearby and it will help me save on commuting time. Many school near the project site as I found while driving around the area. Yamuna City, MSX and many other mall are also nearby.So could be a good investment.

Very happy with investment. Let's see how they execute. Really near to Purti Chowk and from Gaur Chowk only 2.5 km. Three-side open and very nice location on the expressway itself. Am expecting high footfall once the mall project completes.

Am excited about investing here. My company was looking for prime and well-connected office space and glad they gave me the responsibility for investment here. Very spacious suites have been promised. Also mall below and all amenities will make it attractive for employees once project is done.

Location-wise, it is very nice. Roads all around the project. Many IT firms and industrial hub nearby, along with Sector-16 and 16B residential places. High traffic and footfall is expected so decided to invest in retail unit. Good visibility and parking facility they are building.

Saya Group is a reputed name and I am happy with the future potential of my investment. Excellent location on the corner plot just on expressway and Purti Chowk is just about 120 meters. Multiplex and fine dining options/food court will keep people coming and huge industrial cum residential belt to serve nearby.

Location is very very prime I feel. So I invested and also developer is big name. Saya is giving easy access to highway and multiple roads. Best part is that Sector 16 and 16B are nearby along with many offices. So mall and multiplex will keep crowd coming. Great business suites they have planned and pricing is fair for location. All amenities are available as we expect in standard configuration.

Prime location in my opinion at this price point. Aqua Line metro extension will make it a hot property and I am booking now to benefit from lower prices. They will increase very fast in future. Developer is also Godrej so brand value will be huge. Also, the connectivity to schools and hospitals will bring more families I feel.

See I invested because the developer is Godrej. So value will always be there in the future. Location-wise, Sector 12 makes sense, since metro expansion and other road work is going on. I am also excited being slightly closer to Town Central than my current home.

First thing is that the link road is only a few meters from the project. So, connectivity-wise, I will find it easier to reach my office in Yotta data center park nearby. Also, there are malls, schools, and hospitals that you can reach in 25-30 minutes from the project site as I found.

I can recommend this project to my clients. Godrej Properties is one of India's biggest developers and Sector 12 in Noida Extension will benefit from Aqua line metro, Peripheral Road, and many other projects. Developer is offering fair price point and great amenities, while the DPS and Shri Ram Global School are also nearby.

Godrej Project in sector 12 was always an appealing proposition for family. Wife urged to invest and I followed her lead. This is because we need more space and live nearby on rent now. Pricing and developer support are both good and we already know the area having stayed here for so many years.

Was looking for investment opportunity near Yamuna Expressway. This seemed the perfect fit, especially since Purvanchal is a well-known name. Price I think is good for the location which is right off the Expressway. It will help me get good connectivity in the future once project is ready. The proposed plan is like a five-star hotel!

See, the design that they are promising, layout, amenities- everything is just like a star hotel property. So that was a big attraction. Second thing is the area. Sector 22D is prime zone since the Expressway is only 200 meters approx from the project site. Now, Eastern Peripheral Expressway is also very accessible. That's a major plus.

I will appreciate the smooth sales experience with developer. Very helpful and nice. I was able to find unit of my preference and book it. Location on expressway is helpful and connectivity is good to Infosys SEZ where I work. So win-win deal for me I think

My family members were all in love with the project. It has a spacious layout and is located on the Expressway itself. So, I am very happy that I could book no before prices start rising. The location is prime and Yamuna City Mall is also accessible, which is our favorite hangout.

You will understand how prime the area is once you go there. I took a drive to the project site and saw how big it is and how close the expressway is there. The new Noida international airport is also not very far, while Gaurs International and all other institution are also accessible. I think it's a good investment from my end.

Excellent place to invest in my opinion. I was happy to book here. Good developer who already has other projects and I liked the location. Sector 22D is a hot one and this is because of close access to Expressway. My office will not be too far once I start living here in the future.

My parents have booked a unit here and I think they are making the right decision. Yamuna Expressway and EPR connectivity is actually good in few minutes you will reach the roads for going to many destinations. Also, the Noida international airport will be smoothly accessible.

ACE developer group is very cooperative and friendly. They have answered all questions and were very helpful all throughout the sales process. The location is a great one and I liked the fact that Galgotia, Gautam Buddha University and many other institutions are nearby.

I was looking for a good space on Expressway or near it for my parents who are now senior citizens. Also hospital options had to be there nearby. This one has access to Kalash, Divya Multispecialty and Shiv Medicity and also the connectivity is overall good.

I am sure once you drive on the Expressway and reach this project site, you will fall in love just the way I did! Both me and my wife were awed by the plan they are presenting us and also the multiple amenities provided here. Also, location-wise, schools, hospitals, offices- everything is accessible.

Very rarely have I seen such a project that is near so many major roads. So the Yamuna Expressway is only a few kilometers and the Surajpur-Kasna Road is right next to the project site. Also, the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway is just 500 meters away. Multiple schools and hospitals are nearby, making it a great place to invest. That's why I did.

This project seemed a good one to invest and I went ahead for the prime location. The area has developed a lot and there are all social amenities nearby. One of the best things is that the Yamuna Expressway is nearby, just about 3-4 km away. This will help me commute to my office in the future.

When it comes to location, nothing beats this one. The Gaur Legacy project developer brand value is huge and being within the prime Jaypee Greens Township was a big plus for me. All major road and expressway nearby and so many retail stores.

Checked out the entire site and surrounding area thoroughly over several days before booking my unit here. Developer is trusted of course, and Jaypee Greens community is the icing on the cake. Yamuna Expressway and Noida-Greater Noida Expressway are easy to connect from site and found quite a few hospitals and schools nearby. So that makes me feel good.

Nothing much to be discouraged about project and area. So, Jaypee Greens township is big draw and Gaurs Legacy project is a mega one I think. Investment prospect is good and expressways are nearby. Also, there are so many amenities they are offering and social amenities are readily available in area. I think I will get quality life here when the project completes in the future.

Seemed like a great project to invest in to scale up my retail business. Excellent location, right near NH-24 and footfall will be good since it is popular. Also, I like the amenities they are offering, especially lifestyle-oriented.

It's an excellent concept which is ideal for people in businesses like us. The unique food mall concept will become really big in next few years I feel. Hence I booked my unit here. The developer is also reliable and also I am happy with fit and finish of the space.

My friend showed me the project where he has invested and we are in same business. Aligned with our business values and hence went ahead and booked. Location is going to be a major hit in future with NH-24 nearby and there is direct road without any congestion.

Developer has successfully implemented this fabulous concept of the Food Mall. Now I think that investing here has been a great choice for me. Pricing is right and developer team was very supportive and cooperating nicely at all stage of project.

I was first doubtful but later they explained concept very nicely. Now project is about to take off and is almost ready. they have given good quality facilities for us retail owners. Happy with pricing and they are quite flexible on terms also.

Very happy with my investment here. Still early days but I feel that project is going to take off in a huge way. First thing is that Prestige is doing the building and also the main point is that Outer Ring Road is close by. So that will bring more development soon.

Prestige Group is a reliable name in the South market. So naturally I was attracted to this project, specially for its wonderful location in Rajendra Nagar. My office is accessible through Outer Ring Road which runs near the project. Also, TISS and all other instituion are also situated in the close vicinity.

Excellent location. I work in Financial District and that's not very far from here. Also, one thing attracting me was the lovely lake view. That itself was reason to invest and price point they have kept quite decent in my opinion.

I found this project very nicely accessible from Outer Ring Road and also from PVNR Expressway where lot of work has happened. Many malls, hospitals and institutions are nearby, while the Financial District is also well-connected. So, I did not have any complaints here. Price-wise it seems fine.

With TISS, Mantra Mall and so many hospitals accessible from project site, it made a good place to invest. Rajendra Nagar has come up quickly as good place and many roads are there for nice connectivity. Also, I finally went ahead since developer is a reputed name with good track record of delivery.

Good to invest as I found. Very prime area with easy access to Old Mumbai Highway and also the Nehru Outer Ring Road. Kokapet value is going up and I found it sensible to buy now before they skyrocket later on.

Was looking for a good investment in Kokapet. The area has developed a lot and all the infrastructure is available here. Went for this project among many others since it is Godrej. They are a big name and I am confident of the quality also. So, let's hope they make it work.

Excellent project site with only a kilometer distance to the Nehru Outer Ring Road. Very good access to Old Mumbai Highway also. Global Edge School and all are also situated nearby, making it a very friendly and peaceful area.

Eye and dental hospital are there in the neighborhood and many schools also. Quick cut to Outer Ring Road for excellent access to many places. Metro line phase II will make it a booming place in the next few years. ORR expansion can also benefit the place down the line.

This location site in Kokapet is nice due to ring road and good last-mile commute options too. Drove around the place and saw the schools and clinics. Convenience store and all are also here. I work in Mindspace and office is also easily accessible from the project site. So, I found it a viable option for investment.

See, firstly developer is Godrej. I will always say that they do offer some high-quality spaces and very spacious layout for shop here. Pricing point is right enough and the location is near two main highways also.

I was looking for a store that is near the Yamuna Expressway and Noida-Greater Noida Expressway. This one fits the bill, since both are only few minutes away from the project. The store layout is fine and amenities they are offering is good enough.
